componentDescription: The foundation for building custom-styled popovers.

animated.description: Whether the popover can animate, adding animation-related attributes and allowing for exit animations to play. Useful to disable in tests to remove async behavior.

closeDelay.description: The delay in milliseconds until the popover popup is closed when openOnHover is true.

defaultOpen.description: Whether the popover popup is open by default. Use when uncontrolled.

delay.description: The delay in milliseconds until the popover popup is opened when openOnHover is true.

onOpenChange.description: Callback fired when the popover popup is requested to be opened or closed. Use when controlled.

open.description: Whether the popover popup is open. Use when controlled.

openOnHover.description: Whether the popover popup opens when the trigger is hovered after the provided delay.
